name: "Kick Yo Ass" REMiX I
description: This is a totally awesome, and extremely addictive remix of the awesome but never played (becuz it was too cheap) wad: KASS_DM2. This is a total remix and replaces all the items and we thought since we were doing the items, why not make the level cooler so we did, and we put in some...ahem...interesting things...:)... anyway, this wad is cool and give it a try, and we will have more versions of this awesome wad soon...and REMEMBER, for max enjoyment play 4 PLAYERS! 3 players is ok too...:(...
